LanguageData.RV2_Widget_IsPredatorAutoOnDesc: Currently allowed to vore other pawns.\nAutomatically assigned by settings
LanguageData.RV2_Widget_IsPredatorAutoOffDesc: Currently not allowed to vore other pawns.\nAutomatically assigned by settings
LanguageData.RV2_Widget_IsPredatorManualOnDesc: Currently allowed to vore other pawns.\nManually assigned by player
LanguageData.RV2_Widget_IsPredatorManualOffDesc: Currently not allowed to vore other pawns.\nManually assigned by player
LanguageData.RV2_Widget_IsEndoPreyAutoOnDesc: Currently allowed to be non-fatally vored by other pawns.\nAutomatically assigned by settings
LanguageData.RV2_Widget_IsEndoPreyAutoOffDesc: Currently not allowed to be non-fatally vored by other pawns.\nAutomatically assigned by settings
LanguageData.RV2_Widget_IsEndoPreyManualOnDesc: Currently allowed to be non-fatally vored by other pawns.\nManually assigned by player
LanguageData.RV2_Widget_IsEndoPreyManualOffDesc: Currently not allowed to be non-fatally vored by other pawns.\nManually assigned by player
LanguageData.RV2_Widget_IsNeverEndoPreyDesc: Can not be non-fatally vored by other pawns.
LanguageData.RV2_Widget_IsFatalPreyAutoOnDesc: Currently allowed to be fatally vored by other pawns.\nAutomatically assigned by settings
LanguageData.RV2_Widget_IsFatalPreyAutoOffDesc: Currently not allowed to be fatally vored by other pawns.\nAutomatically assigned by settings
LanguageData.RV2_Widget_IsFatalPreyManualOnDesc: Currently allowed to be fatally vored by other pawns.\nManually assigned by player
LanguageData.RV2_Widget_IsFatalPreyManualOffDesc: Currently not allowed to be fatally vored by other pawns.\nManually assigned by player
LanguageData.RV2_Widget_IsNeverFatalPreyDesc: Can not be fatally vored by other pawns.
LanguageData.RV2_Widget_Grapple: Force the pawn to walk to and initiate a vore grapple with the selected target
LanguageData.RV2_Command_ToggleGrapple_DescOn: This pawn is currently allowed to use grapple moves during combat
LanguageData.RV2_Command_ToggleGrapple_DescOff: This pawn is currently NOT allowed to use grapple moves during combat
